testcase.name: Account retrival
testcase.system-out: * url 'https://demo.spreecommerce.org' .................................... passed * header Accept = 'application/json' ...................................... passed * def AccessFeatureFile = call read('AccessToken.feature') ................ passed * def AccessToken = AccessFeatureFile.AccessToken ......................... passed Given header Authorization = 'Bearer '+ AccessToken ....................... passed When path '/api/v2/storefront/account' .................................... passed When method GET ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed * def jsonobject = response ............................................... passed * print jsonobject ........................................................ passed
